comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create Dynamic Web Project (without jsf facet)
2. Create jsp :
<%@ taglib uri="http://java.sun.com/jsf/html" prefix="h" %>
<h:commandButton action="" value=""/>
3. Ctrl+Space on action="|"

ActionType line 75:
List rules = JSFAppConfigManager.getInstance(wr.getProject()).getNavigationRulesForPage(jsp);

but JSFAppConfigManager.getInstance(project) returns null if project doesn't have jsf facet.
